name: Dominik Schwind
text:
Mentioned by https://lostfocus.de/2025/06/02/weeknotes-in-other-places/

> Gyford James Van Dyne Jeff Bridgforth Joel Chrono Robb Knight Roy Tang Walknotes And I’m pretty sure that’s just the tiny little

content.html:
When talking to a friend today about weeknotes I mentioned that besides me and my friends over at weeknotes.cafe it’s is actually a thing on quite a few personal blogs out there.

Just searching for the terms “week” and “weeknotes” in my feed reader already gives me these blogs, sorted alphabetically:

  • Alice Bartlett
  • Anh
  • Barry Frost
  • Phil Gyford
  • James Van Dyne
  • Jeff Bridgforth
  • Joel Chrono
  • Robb Knight
  • Roy Tang
  • Walknotes

And I’m pretty sure that’s just the tiny little tip of an iceberg of bloggers publishing (semi)regular updates on their life. I’m absolutely open to following more personal blogs, so if you know someone who writes weeknotes, let me know. (You can reply to this post on Mastodon, which is pretty handy. Or send me a Webmention, which is maybe even nerdier.)
content.text:
When talking to a friend today about weeknotes I mentioned that besides me and my friends over at weeknotes.cafe it’s is actually a thing on quite a few personal blogs out there.



Just searching for the terms “week” and “weeknotes” in my feed reader already gives me these blogs, sorted alphabetically:



Alice Bartlett



Anh



Barry Frost



Phil Gyford



James Van Dyne



Jeff Bridgforth



Joel Chrono



Robb Knight



Roy Tang



Walknotes
And I’m pretty sure that’s just the tiny little tip of an iceberg of bloggers publishing (semi)regular updates on their life. I’m absolutely open to following more personal blogs, so if you know someone who writes weeknotes, let me know. (You can reply to this post on Mastodon, which is pretty handy. Or send me a Webmention, which is maybe even nerdier.)
